verse: निश्चला त्वयि भक्तिर् या सैव मुक्तिर् जनार्दन । मुक्ता एव हि भक्तास् ते तव विष्णो यतो हरे ॥

terms.जनार्दन: another name for Lord Vishnu, the one who brings joy to the people
terms.विष्णो: another name for Lord Vishnu, the all-pervading one
terms.हरे: O Harah (another name for Lord Vishnu)

meaning: Meaning: Devotion towards you, O Janardana (Lord Vishnu), is the path to liberation. Indeed, your devotees are already liberated, O Vishnu, from whom you take away the pain and suffering.
